## createElement() function

Creates a new element, allowing you to define properties and child nodes at the same time.

**Signature:**

```typescript
declare function createElement<T extends keyof HTMLElementTagNameMap>(tagName: T, options?: CreateElementOptions<T>): HTMLElementTagNameMap[T];
```

</td><td>
